projects.title: AJ's Lawn and Home
projects.about: A website built with brand-consistent and search engine optimization (SEO) best practices to establish and grow the client's online presence.

projects.title: David Chu's China Bistro
projects.about: A pixel-perfect implementation of the original website, refactored from Bootstrap 3 to 5. This website was built as a capstone for a certification course.

projects.title: Shopify Project
projects.about: Working with a local artist to increase online product sales. This website is using Nuxt and Vuetify front end with a Shopify API backend.
